name: Thor Truelson
title: Software Engineer
shortBio: "Vision without execution is hallucination." - Thomas Edison
description: I am a software engineer that has recently graduated from Carnegie Mellon University. I have interest in AI/ML, AI agents, and distributed systems. I currently work at Lockheed Martin Skunkworks on the Mission System Roadmaps DataLinks team. Specifically I work on system architecture for the 5th Gen Crewed Uncrewed Teaming program and the 5G.MIL program.
highlights: B.S. in Artifical Intelligence with Honors from Carnegie Mellon University. Pursuing M.S. in Compter Science from University of Texas at Austin.
